# Button

> A clickable button element with variants

**Kind:** component

```html
<button class="btn btn-{variant}">{children}</button>
```

The Button component renders a styled button with support for primary, secondary, and outline variants.

## Parameters

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
|------|------|----------|-------------|
| `variant` | string |  | Visual style: primary, secondary, outline |
| `disabled` | boolean |  | Whether the button is disabled |

## Examples

### Primary button

```html
<button class="btn btn-primary">Click me</button>
```

**Tags:** `interactive`, `form`
